TopicTitle: How do you mod the IVA?

Articles.Content:
I wish someone could help point me in the right direction.

I really want to make my own IVA views. I have made some external parts in Blender but when I look at the command module cfgs it just says something like this:

// --- internal setup ---

CrewCapacity = 3

INTERNAL

{

name = PodCockpit

}

MODULE

{

name = ModuleCommand

minimumCrew = 1

}

PodCockpit? Where is this PodCockpit and how do I change it?

Actually if I could just know how to change the texture of the thing...that would be a huge leap in the right direction to more significant changes in the IVA, I think.

Edited January 19, 2015 by unsociableTim
Moved this over to Add-On Affairs. Welcome aboard!

From http://kerbalcommunity.com/doku.php?id=wiki:parts:cfg_files

"INTERNAL == Internal specifies the internal files used to construct views from the IVA or internal vehicular activity, and are referenced out to the \Spaces\ directory of the relevant part mod. (Squad's internals are in \GameData\Squad\Spaces)."

So if I'm reading this rightyou'd have:

GameData\unsociableTim\Parts\superpart.cfg

GameData\unsociableTim\Spaces\superpartIVA.cfg

and then:

INTERNAL
{
  name=superpartIVA
}

See also http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94638-Mod-Development-Links-Compilation-START-HERE, there's some video tutorials on making IVAs

Also in general check out http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/37-Add-on-Development
Hey thanks for this. I can't wait till Friday when I am permitting myself to start modelling again. Vowed to close Blender until I got my work done.
